contentrichtext.text: '''Province of Taiwan''' is a term that currently has multiple meanings, and has multiple previous meanings. It may be rendered in Chinese as {{zh|t=臺灣省 or 台灣省|s=台湾省|p=Táiwān shěng}} (Taiwan Province) * [[Taiwan Province, Republic of China]] * [[Taiwan Province, People's Republic of China]], an administrative province claimed by [[PRC]] * ''[[Taiwan, Japan]]'' — see [[Taiwan under Japanese rule]] * ''[[Taiwan under Empire of China]]'' ** ''Taiwan Province, Qing China'' — see [[Taiwan under Qing Dynasty rule]] ==See also== * [[Political status of Taiwan]] * [[Chinese Taipei]] * [[Taiwan (disambiguation)]] {{SIA}}
